elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Which specific business transactions are posted to the specified expense accounts? Enter several business transactions in keywords.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Vehicle expenditure
elements.correctAnswer: Fuel costs, repairs, service work, vehicle insurance, road tax

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Administrative expenses
elements.correctAnswer: Office supplies, toner, telephone costs, stamps

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Other personnel expenses
elements.correctAnswer: Travel expenses, training costs, specialist literature, job advertisements

elements.name: question12
elements.title: Advertising expenditure
elements.correctAnswer: Brochures, promotional gifts, advertisements for products, website
